messages.title: It's time for real change
messages.content: Austerity has stripped our communities... It's time for real change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will ensure that local authorities have mandatory housebuilding targets for social housing.
Labour will put in place a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle climate change.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The tactical vote in this constituency to ensure we beat the Tories is now Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: Boris Johnson's Brexit a disaster for this country
issues.economy: A Farage Johnson alliance would be catastrophic for... our economy.
issues.environment: Labour is the only party that can tackle our... environmental crisis.

housing.content: Labour will ensure your children and grandchildren have the chance to own or rent their own home, unlike the other parties which won’t get us out of the housing crisis.

politicalExperience.achievements: A woman of principle and compassion.
Has led a number of successful campaigns for human rights.

endorsements.endorsement: A fantastic candidate... She’s the compassionate, progressive, pro-European voice Arundel & the South Downs needs.
Bella’s dedication to social justice is clear. She’ll be an outstanding MP.

quotes.text: Labour will ensure that local authorities have mandatory housebuilding targets for social housing.
Labour will put in place a Green Industrial Revolution...

images.caption: Bella Sankey for real change in Arundel and South Downs
